title: civil control
description: Anyone who renounces responsibility also renounces the decision
description_hu: Aki lemond a felelősségről, az lemond a döntésről is.
description_full: Politics, just like corporations, have their own angle of view. Politics, just like corporations, must be kept from breaking common sense to humanity, generosity, responsibility—big words. This webring is a curated list of civil movements who work for similar objective.
